Exercises-code_output_Question9_key1: Create a loop that takes 10 numbers as input from the user.
Exercises-code_output_Question9_key2: After taking the input console the sum of all those numbers.
Exercises-code_output_Question9_key3: This program will go like this. Each time using readline-sync will take a number input from the user.
Exercises-code_output_Question9_key5: Then for example 10+16+9+10+56+78+98+43+21+76.. Total sum of number 417
